#summary OpenID

= eID IdP as OpenID identity provider =

The eID IdP product can act as an OpenID identity provider. For the eID IdP instance running on the e-contract.be server, your OpenID identifier is:
https://www.e-contract.be/eid-idp/endpoints/openid-identity/xrds

Copy and paste this identifier when web applications ask for your OpenID identifier.


= OpenID Applications =

The following OpenID enabled applications can accept the eID IdP OpenID identity:
 * https://www.e-contract.be/eid-idp-sp/
 * http://www.mychores.co.uk
 * https://www.hampr.com/
